title: Звёзды в Африке
overview: In the new TNT reality show, 15 celebrities of show business, music, sports, cinema and the Internet settled for a month on the banks of a wild river in the famous Limpopo region. They will have to fight for food, find a common language with other participants and go through tough tests. If the participant realizes that he can no longer tolerate what is happening, he has the opportunity to shout: "I am a star! Take me away from here!" In the final, the strongest will receive 5 million rubles, which the producers will direct to support endangered species of animals and funds that care about environmental protection. The show will be hosted by Olga Buzova and Mikhail Galustyan, they will not only watch the participants from the outside, but will also support them in difficult moments - and there will be many of them in the wild South African nature.
